## Bladeburner.getBlackOp() method

Get the name of the available Bladeburner BlackOp

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBlackOp(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

Name of current BlackOp as a string, or "All BlackOps Completed."

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.4 GB

Returns the name of the current BlackOp, regardless of rank, or "All BlackOps Completed" if no BlackOps remain in the BitNode.
